summary: Removes everything from the loading screen.  It\'s completely black and gives you no information about the game whatsoever.
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------
Main Description
Removes everything from the loading screen.  It\'s completely black and gives you no information about the game whatsoever.

Please leave a comment if you experience any bugs while loading a game.  I loaded many different saves and didn\'t have any problems with it.  I completely stripped the loading screen file of everything but background color so I wouldn\'t be surprised if a problem turned up, but I didn\'t have any.

1.0:  initial release

----------------------------------------------------------------
>> Installation

Put the file in your skyrim data\\interface folder

If you have the steam version of the game, you can find the Skyrim interface folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data

the steam folder is probably in your  MainDrive:\\program files\\  folder

the directory should then read Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\interface
within that folder should be:

loadingmenu.swf


>> Uninstallation

Remove the following files:

Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\interface\\loading.swf
author: Forsaken32
